name: Alec Constable
text: There was an issue with my order and they had to remake it so I waited a little extra. I was refunded and my order was made on the fly. The pizza was fantastic and the professionalism of the staff speaks volumes of the way this location is ‚Ä¶More

text: Nice Pizza but service was not so good. Had to wait more compared to the time they told while ordering.

name: Sandra Smith
text: Ordered bacon chicken ranch pizza with extra chicken. I guess they thought we wouldn't notice but they cut up the bigger pieces of chicken that ordinarily comes on the pizza, into smaller pieces and spread it over the pizza. WE NOTICED!!!. ‚Ä¶More

text: Best fast food during virus pandemic. I won't eat anything outside my home except pizza. I only like deep dish from HH though.

name: Brenda Ford
text: The food is wonderful here. Very prompt and courteous service.  Outstanding performance by all staff and I give a hearty recommendation to anyone in the area looking for a quick and delicious bite to eat.

name: photoxliz videos
text: very good pizza. i think this has to be the first place where i ask for extra cheese and they actually fulfill my order. the staff is friendly and they are decently quick at making the pizzas. it‚Äôs a convenient location and the lobby area is neat and clean. mobil ordering is always good as well

name: Jay Bob
text: We always get good friendly service,  and the pizza is excellent! We had one issue with our last order and the manager more than made up for it. I love this location.

name: Joseph Barkley
text: Store is incredibly filthy. Someone is going to get sick if they haven't already.

name: Henry Jacob
text: I guess I order pizza here pretty often because the staff knows me by name and the service is friendly and quick.  Deep dish and thin crust are above average for a HH location, hand-tossed is maybe on par with Little Seizures (not the greatest).  For the price, this place gets 5 stars.

name: Carrie Chapman
text: The young lady was not professional

text: Fast and super nice.  It's a chain so if you have had one you have had most of them... But the employees at this location seem to care and usually have a big smile on their faces.   I prefer asking for my pizza "well done" it seems to taste even better that way.

name: Lori Carlson
text: Ordered pizza for pick up Repeated order twice. When got there pizza was wrong!  Was told person who took order was new in training. If can't get right than don't put on phone orders. Not first time told this and our order was screwed up. So I have to be inconvenience and wait for new pizza.

name: Silvia
text: The pizza is good. I think the sauce is on the sweet side. You can get flavored crust if you ask for it. And the flavored crust is for free. Good specials also available. Breadsticks are also tasty.

text:

text: I love this location. I downloaded the app and got confused on how to use it. After making a call to this location, the employee that answered the phone downloaded the app onto her phone and was able to help me complete my order. Very friendly service.  My pizza was on point. I give them 5 stars.
